inn1.comm: starts off with a yorker length which he digs out to mid-on, good start by Irfan
Irfan gets good carry here, lands it outside off, Ingram does well to leave it alone, comes back in
a low full toss, almost a yorker, the ball really dips and he digs it out to the off side
hits him high on the pad but down the leg side, stifled appeal by Irfan
this was pitched up and angling in and he mistimed the drive towards cover
he drifts towards the pads and he closes the face and tucks it down to square leg
god start by Junaid, runs in at full pace and lands it on the off stump and Amla defends
good carry for Junaid, fires that outside off and it holds its line before reaching the keeper
this one fizzed past the bat! Good bounce, better than the last ball, kicks up and Amla was in a fix
angles it across and Amla gets forward and angles it to the off side
good length on the off stump and Ingram was back at the crease to defend
this one moves away from the left-hander and Ingram is happy to leave it alone
this one moves away sharply from the right-hander and he safely leaves it alone
Amla was foxed by the extra bounce, hops and gets hit on the rib cage, the ball is wedged behind his pads, picks it up and hands it back to the bowler
bowls a yorker length and he digs it out back to the bowler
bit short of a length and Amla taps it to the off side wide of gully
keeps him on the back foot and Ingram goes back and defends, the ball rolls to the on side
this was too full and straight, he shuffles and clips it away behind square on the on side
hits him on the pads and there's an lbw appeal, he was on the back foot but the ball would have missed leg
looked like he was trying to leave that, appeared to shoulder arms to a ball down the leg side and the ball clipped his body and rolled to fine leg
Amla stays on the back foot and knocks it towards midwicket
hits a good length and Ingram too commits to the back foot and punches it to the off side
angles it inward and he stays back and knocks it to the on side
extra bounce this time, he stayed on the back foot and stabbed it to the off side
that should relieve the pressure, this was much too short and wide outside off, Amla hops at the crease and punches it wide of backward point
switches to a much fuller length and he comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
good line, just outside off and he goes back at the crease and shoulders arms, good carry too

Dropped at backward point! Umar Amin can't hang on, this was short and wide outside off and Amla hopped at the crease as he slashed it, travelled quickly to his left and Amin stuck out his left hand, just got his fingers to it, tougher than it looked initially
drifts on the pads and he whips it just wide of short square leg
good length on middle and off and he hops and defends
gets on the back foot to a length delivery and works it to the on side
short of a length and he stays back and punches it to the off side
keeps it straight and doesn't give him room, stays back and defends
stops on him a bit as he looks to play a shot, he stabs at it and the ball drops well short of short cover
well played, this was short of a length and Ingram was expecting that length by staying on the back foot, went across and pulled it across the line wide of square leg
signs of variable bounce? This stayed a touch low after pitching, came back in and went past the inside half of the bat, bounced once more before reaching Akmal
short of  a length and he safely lets it go
good bounce! This one has Amla weaving away from it, well left though
Amla loses patience here, tries to slash a short one moving away, the ball dipped before landing in Kamran's gloves, stifled appeal
he moves back and across and punches it to the off side
this was fuller and driven from the crease to mid-off
that raced off the middle of the bat but straight to backward point, nicely timed though
he stays back at the crease and punches it to the off side
Junaid's working up a tight line, no room, he stays back at the crease and knocks it to the off side
tucks him up for room again, he makes him hop at the crease before knocking it to point
nicely played, Junaid brings the ball back in and drifts on the pads, Amla works his wrists well and whips it easily down to deep midwicket
fuller in length outside off and driven on the front foot to Amin at backward point
poor delivery, this was a slower ball on the pads and with only a square leg in  place Amla only had to place it slightly wide of him, forced it to the leg side
139.2 kph, keeps him on the back foot and he defends
138 kph, Irfan makes him stay on the back foot, defends with soft hands, the ball drops on the pitch
141 kph, this was a bouncer and Ingram was quick to duck under that
he switches to a fuller length this time and he drives firmly on the front foot but Malik's there at cover to stop that, packed off side field
tucks him up for room and he stays back and defends
just short of a length and Ingram tries to force it away in front of square but mistimes it to mid-on
138 kph, hits a good length and he stays behind the line and punches it towards mid-off
141.8 kph, quicker delivery and Ingram shuffles across quite a bit before defending
138 kph, this was much fuller and outside off and Ingram drives but can't pierce the gap at mid-off
138.8 kph, drifting towards the body and he works it off the back foot wide of midwicket and they think of a second run
this was short and wide down the leg side and Amla initially tried to pull that but withdrew
angling across him and he angled it down to third man

the extra delivery costs a boundary! 143 kph,  this was pitched up and Ingram was eyeing the long-off boundary, he sort of mistimed it and it was in the air but mid-off was wide, he couldn't get around quickly to his left to intercept it
full outside off and clipped to the on side
quicker one and close call for Ingram who got an inside edge to the pads
gets forward and pushed it back to the bowler
from wider of the crease and drifts on the pads and he works it to the on side
stabs it towards the bowler, nearly spooned it back to Hafeez
driven on the up again but short of short of cover
streaky! Not the best ball, full and wide outside the off stump, Amla shaped to drive through the covers and gets an inside edge past the stumps
tucks him up for room and he stays back and defends
loose drive by Amla, he saw the width and went forward and the ball beat  the edge
full and wide again and Amla once again mistimes the drive, gets an inside edge towards mid-on and sets off
on the stumps and easily clipped away softly towards midwicket for an easy single
142.4 kph, fullish outside off and Amla mistimes the drive again, rolls down the pitch
this one straightens, stays back and works it towards mid-on
pauses before delivery, full and driven towards mid-on
tossed up and he drives a full delivery towards mid-off
goes back and works it towards midwicket
tossed up and Ingram gets well forward and defends
chips down the track and checks his drive, he works it towards midwicket
143.3 kph, this was his quickest today, full outside off and he drives firmly but can't beat cover
stays back at the crease and punches it to the off side
doesn't have much room to work with, stays back and punches it towards the off side
144.8 kph, not the best delivery, full outside off and he mistimes the drive towards mid-off
144 kph, super timing! This was fractionally wide outside off and Amla stayed beside the line and played it late, guided it wide of backward point
exaggerated shuffle across the stumps and he works it away wide of square leg
pauses at the crease and he bowls it full and drives down to mid-on

given lbw on the sweep! Tossed up on middle and off, Ingram was on his knee to sweep, the ball straightened after pitching, very nearly brushed the glove on the way to the pads, was quite adjacent to the stumps, the umpire didn't spend too much time for his verdict
gets forward and defends to the off side
stays back and punches it towards mid-on
goes back and clips it with the turn to midwicket
goes back and punches it back to the bowler
fetches a full delivery wide outside off and drives him towards midwicket
144.8 kph, he angles it across the right-hander and he opens the face and steers it to the off side
short of a length outside off and he punches him wide of cover off the back foot
143.4 kph, almost found the edge! That's a Wahab special, lands on off and holds its line, Faf had to poke at it
140.5 kph, this time he shuffles across the stumps to cover that angle, manages to run it towards point
this was short and wide outside off and Amla risks trying to slash it down to third man, extra bounce this time
slower through the air and he defends to the off side
outside edge but no slip! Tossed up outside off and Amla was a bit early on the shot, wanted to drive through extra cover, edge races past Akmal
waits for the turn and knocks it to the on side
down the track and checks his shot and punches it to mid-off
skids through and he knocs it down the track
uses his feet early but checks his shot
he goes back at the crease and pushes it to the off side
little short of a length outside off and he walks across the stumps and pushes it wide of point
121.9 kph, slower ball, short and wide outside off and he punches it straight to sweeper cover
142.5 kph, a bit too straight and Faf easily tucks it behind square on the on side

he had to hurry! Amla was forward for the drive and pushed it just wide of mid-off, he called for it but still had to scamper on seeing the fielder attack the ball, the throw to the bowler's stumps wasn't accurate enough though
stays back and punches it down the track
punches it with the turn down to long-on
that was well played, he went across the stumps and paddled it down to fine leg
drives very firmly back to the bowler
clips it with the turn down to midwicket
tried to paddle this down to fine leg again but this was a quicker ball, flatter and hitting him on the pads outside the line of the off stump
this was fullish outside off and driven straight towards mid-off
angles across the stumps and he gets forward and across and pushes it to cover

adjusted well there, this was short and wide outside off and Amla hopped at the crease to negotiate that, importantly he kept it down and placed it wide of backward point, third man gave up after a few seconds
stays back at the crease and times the punch well past cover
this was a sharp bouncer and du Plessis withdraws the shot at the last minute
gets behind the line and punches it to the off side
stays back and pushes it to the off side
goes back and whips it away to the on side
stays back and punches it wide of backward point and down to the sweeper
du Plessis makes a lot of room before the delivery, checks his drive and places it towards mid-on
flatter delivery on the pads and worked away to midwicket
skids on the pads and he clips it away
moves a long way across to paddle it and he's hit on the pads outside the line of off, stifled appeal
fired through quicker and he was a long way across, hits him high on the pads and that wouldn't have hit
shuffles across and checks his drive
the doosra beats the outside edge, quicker one too
works it away with the turn wide of square leg and Amla gets his fifty!
full on the pads and worked to square leg
nearly gave it away! Made a lot of room to carve that over cover, extra bounce and he nearly edges it
full on the pads and clipped towards midwicket
skids through and he punches it square on the off side, sets off, slips and heads back to the crease
works it away towards mid-on
gets forward and pushes it to wards mid-on
clips it with the turn to midwicket
excellent save  by Junaid! Amla played the reverse sweep and he middled it, Junaid was at deep point and he had to run quickly to his left
poor fielding this time!  Ajmal fumbles as the ball was driven straight to him, long-on has to mop up
another reverse sweep and this time he finds the gap at third man, placed it finer and he middled it, Junaid had no chance
went for the sweep a bit too early, the ball hits his body and drops on the pitch
driven back to Hafeez
comes forward and checks his drive
makes room and works it with the turn to the leg side
stays at the crease and punches it firmly towards mid-on

good adjustment there, Du Plessis made room before the bowler delivered, Hafeez made the mistake of tossing it up wide outside off, the batsman went forward and drove it wide of mid-off, it's the 50 stand as well
sides it down the leg side
works it towards midwicket for a single
risky run! Du Plessis drove it fairly hard down to mid-off, he set off quickly and a direct hit was needed
clips it to the onside and he doesn't take the single
Amla shuffles across and looks to play the reverse sweep, the ball brushes the glove and rolls to the on side, the keeper got excited
works it down to deep midwicket
pushes it down to backward point
quicker delivery and he gets forward and blocks it out
Amla shuffles across fairly early and works it wide of square leg
fires that full and wide outside off and he jams it out to third man
139.2 kph, that's a sharp bouncer, Amla did well to weave away from it, the umpire had a look but gave the benefit of the doubt to the bowler
tucks it to the on side and Irfan himself decided to do the honours and charged to square leg to pick up the ball, saved a certain second run
didn't pick the full toss! Attempted slower ball and du Plessis wanted to play it but the ball dipped on him and he lost sight of it
stays back and pushes it to the off side
put away with force! Ajmal from round the wicket, on the pads, the leg side not very well protected and he swept it firmly to deep square leg
quicker delivery and he shuffles across and defends

du Plessis makes room and pushes it to the vacant point region, takes the first run hard and they have to scamper the second, the fielder aims at the bowler's end but the ball bounces too much and clears the bowler
driven towards the bowler who fumbles
clips it with the turn to the on side
he makes room to drive and gets an inside edge past the stumps, big cheers for Irfan who dives at short fine leg and saves a couple of runs
stays beside the line and punches it to the off side
soft dismissal! Foxed by the extra bounce, du Plessis tries to pull a short ball that gains on him quickly, the ball lobs up off the toe of the bat and goes to Malik at cover
AB pushes a fullish delivery down to point
stays back at the crease and knocks it towards midwicket, Irfan runs across to pick up but slips
it's a no-ball for height! Slips out and it was wide outside off, Amla slashes and there's no slip, down to third man
drifts on the pads and he easily clips it to fine leg, the fielder slides and cuts it off
the doosra, he stays back at the crease and works it towards long-on, short midwicket slides and can't stop it
stays back and clips him down to short midwicket
fires that quicker, down the leg side, brushes the pads and the ball runs to the leg side
stays back and works it to the on side
flatter delivery and worked towards midwicket
sharp turn straightaway! Off the rough, goes back and has to quickly adjust to block it out
tossed up and he gets forward and works it with the turn to long-on
AB was a bit too early on the drive, the ball hits his body and dribbles away
there was a hush as the ball sailed over the rope, this was short outside off, he waited for the turn and biffed it over deep midwicket, the majority of the crowd went silent
fuller delivery and he pushes it down to backward point
drifts on the pads and it's clipped away to square leg

confident appeal for lbw! This one turned from the rough, spun back in sharply and hit his pads, may have missed the leg stump, Ajmal, Akmal and Misbah thought about it, the ball tracker showed that missing leg

caught off the reverse sweep! Amla was in position early for the shot, probably bounced more than he expected, the ball lobs off the glove and dips towards short third man, Hafeez timed his dive well and plucked it inches off the turf
tossed up wide outside off and he lunges forward and drives to the off side
comes well forward and knocks it towards midwicket
goes back at the crease and he gets an inside edge to the pads
chips down the track and he checks his drive
pushes it to the off side
once again he comes down the track and checks his drive, knocked back to the bowler
works it down to square leg for a single
down the leg side and he sweeps down to fine leg
beats him with the turn!
tossed up wide outside the off stump and he spanks it on the front foot, deep extra cover dives and fumbles
comes forward and pushes it down to long-on
on the pads and he works it down to midwicket
he makes room and the ball skids through and he chops it to the off side
it's a low full toss on the pads and he works it to the on side
quicker delivery and he comes forward and pushes it to long-off
flatter delivery and AB drives it down the ground to long-on
another easy single, down the ground to long-on, Pakistan will be happy so long as there are no boundaries in the PP
flatter delivery and nudged down to midwicket
he pauses before delivery and he pushes it towards long-on
turn again! Comes back in and he manages to block it out
tossed up and he comes forward and pushes it to long-on
drops it in front of point and sets off quickly for the single
the top spinner this time, tries to cut but misses
short outside off and he works it towards midwicket
starts off with a short delivery, makes him hop at the crease to fend it off
close call for JP! He was cramped for room outside off as he tried to dab it down to third man, Akmal went up for a few seconds and withdrew
short of a length again and he chops it towards the off side for a single
this was angled across and AB followed the angle and dabbed it down to third man
fuller delivery and he leans forward and drives him down to cover
a bit too straight and he stays back at the crease to clip it away down to square leg
flatter delivery, he comes well forward and knocks it down to long-on
tossed up on the pads and he lunges forward and blocks
sharp stuff from Malik! JP was down the track and drove it back to the bowler, Malik was quick to gather, JP had to scamper back
knocks it to the off side for a quick single
shuffles and clips it with the turn to square leg
makes room and drives on the front foot to long-off
keeps him on the back foot, has time to adjust and knock it down to third man
chops it gully, Amin runs across to pick it up and there's some hesitation in the running
clips it down to square leg for a single
how easy was that? This was short of a length and on the pads, AB played a one-legged pull, timed it well and his placement was even better - bisected fine leg and deep square leg, excellent stuff
goes back and punches it towards point
this was short as well and JP tried to pull it like AB did, mistimed it to square leg
this one skids through as he makes room, chops it to the off side
shuffles and clips it to the on side
flatter delivery and he works it to square leg
uses his feet again, works it against the turn to mid-on
quicker delivery and he drills it back to the bowler
141 kph, shuffles and clips a length delivery down to square leg
keeps it straight and JP tries to work it across the line but can't beat mid-on
tucks him up for room, he opens the face and chops it down to third man
good length on the stumps and he chops it down to mid-off

terrible mix-up! For starters there was no single, JP whipped a full delivery down to mid-on, AB set off from the other end but was ball watching, he went midway and slipped as he turned around, Misbah ran across to the bowler's end and whipped the bails
fullish on the pads and he works it towards square leg
tossed up on the pads and he knocks it to square leg
slower through the air, Miller lunges forward and defends to the off side
stays back at the crease and knocks it to the on side
nicely done, trapped with soft hands towards point and they call early for the single
stays back and punches it with a straight bat down to long-on
gives it a lot more air, firmly drives him down to wide long-off
short of a length on the body and he tucks it to square leg
gives him just a hint of width and he opens the face and angles it down to third man
Junaid's keeping it nice and straight, 141 kph, Miller doesn't have room to force that away
137 kph, stays back and he knocks it down to square leg
banged in short and he swivels and pulls it with the angle down to fine leg

Direct hit and JP's in trouble! Yet another slip would you believe this! Miller pushed it towards short midwicket and once again there was no run for the taking, JP had set off, slipped as he turned around, headed back to the crease in desperation but couldn't beat Misbah's accuracy
comes forward and pushes it to the off side
makes room and pushes it towards cover for a single
goes back at the crease and knocks it towards mid-on
tossed up and he drives to long-off
you can't keep Misbah out of the game, dives and stops a firm cover drive, Malik runs across and pats his captain on the back
shuffles and works it away wide of square leg
comes down the track and checks his shot
shuffles and knocks it to the on side
beaten for turn! He was expecting the doosra but it was the off break
plays the reverse sweep but can't beat short fine leg, Amin slides and cuts it off
stays back and clips it against the turn to square leg
mistimes the drive to the off side, wanted to work it to the on side
cramped him up for room, managed to chop it to the off side
Miller was down the pitch and he is struggling to put it away, checks the shot
he has a bit of width this time, makes room and slams him to sweeper cover

He's been given out lbw and McLaren is reviewing it! Malik bowls from round the wicket, pitched on middle and off, straightens a little, McLaren was on the back foot to clip it to the on side, hit on the pads, no inside edge, the ball tracker shows the ball clipping the leg stump, the umpire's call stands
starts off with a neat cover drive to the sweeper
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
Miller comes down the track and checks the shot, chipped in the air down to mid-on
keeps a touch low, manages to punch it down the track
softly pushes it down to point and still no single
worked with the angle down to short fine leg and he has to scamper back, another dot
four consecutive dots! The fruatration gets to Peterson as he shapes to slog, playing away from the body, beaten for turn
good fielding by Junaid! Peterson went down the track and chipped it to deep extra cover, Junaid made a lot of ground from long-off and managed to parry the ball back inside the boundary
this was pitched fuller and he drags it down to long-on
this is a reverse swinging yorker which he digs out to square leg
Wahab completely lost control of that one! That was a quick, scary full toss down the leg side, the batsman couldn't connect, Kamran did really well to save four wides
he makes a bit of room and digs out a reverse swinging yorker to the on side
some relief for SA there, this was a low full toss, attempted another yorker, clipped across the line and beats deep square leg
makes room to put away a yorker, edges it to the boot and the ball rolls on the pitch, they take a quick single, Riaz tries to boot it to the stumps
Peterson in desperation tries the reverse paddle, good change of pace by Riaz, he fails to make contact
attempted a yorker and he mistimed the flick to the on side, 9 deliveries left
nobody moved, Junaid bowls a half volley wide outside off and with many fielders in the circle on the off side he was asking for trouble, Peterson crashed that past the covers
varies his length by bowling the bouncer, Peterson ducks and the leg umpire calls it
not a bad over at all so far for SA! Junaid reverts to the yorker length, it's a low full toss, Peterson makes room and drives wide of mid-off, fielder gives up the chase
much better length, yorker length wide outside off and he digs it out to point
the boundary count for the over increases, it's a low full toss and he makes room and the outside edge runs to third man

Misbah's everywhere today! Good reflexes from the captain, Junaid fired that full on middle, Miller makes room and chips it towards extra cover, didn't time it well, Misbah anticipated that well, timed his fall to his left and plucked it with both hands
fires that wide outside off and he fails to make contact
full outside off and he drags it down to mid-off
this was dragged short and he made room to flat-bat that to the on side, found the gap at midwicket, two fielders chase and relay

another direct hit and Morris has to go! Riaz fired that full on the stumps and Peterson made room, mistimed it back to the bowler, Morris was backing up too far and it was too late as Riaz hit the stumps, no need for the third umpire
full outside the off stump and he makes room but fails to put bat on ball

another direct hit, Peterson shuffled across his stumps to scoop that to fine leg, didn't make contact, they try to pinch a bye, Akmal under-arms it to the stumps, Phangiso is a few inches short, the third umpire confirms it

inn2.comm: lands it outside the off stump and he safely leaves it alone
fullish in length outside off and he softly pushes it towards mid-off
hits a good length on middle and Farhat pushes it to mid-off
drifts on the pads and he tries to work it away, the ball hits the pads
full on the off stump and driven down to mid-on
a bit too straight and he turns the face of the bat and works it wide of midwicket
he will like to forget his first delivery in ODIs, gets swing but it's wide down the leg side
hits a good length on middle and off, he stays back and defends
swings it on the pads and he whips it uppishly down to fine leg
angles it towards the off stump, he stays nicely behind the line and drives to mid-off
that's a lovely delivery! Very teasing angle, comes across and leaves the left-hander just a shade outside off, Farhat was all at sea

Timber! The off stump lies a few yards back. Morris set him up by beating the edge the previous delivery, this one landed on middle and off and straightened, Farhat left a gap between pad and bat, didn't cover the line, the off stump goes for a walk
targets the stumps again, angles it towards off and middle and Hafeez ensures he is behind the line to defend
hits a good length on the off stump and he pushes it to the off side
this was too wide outside off, he punches it wide of point
this one angles across him, fullish delivery and he leaves it alone to the keeper
hesitation in the calling, he punched it off the back foot to cover, stopped and then went through with the single
short of a length outside off and he safely blocks it
lands outside off and he watchfully leaves it alone
well bowled! Angles in from wide of the crease, Hafeez went across to cover the line and the ball sneaked between bat and body
slightly shorter, this one straightens after pitching and Hafeez is tentative
close call! This was knocked to deep square leg, they scamper the second run and Hafeez has to dive
angles it towards middle and leg and Hafeez is solid in defense
a bit too straight and he works it to the on side
a touch short and Jamshed stands tall and punches it to backward point
bowls it fullish outside off and he pushes it to the off side
keeps slightly low and he defends back to the bowler
angling on the pads and he clips it it to the on side
good length outside off and he leaves it alone to the keeper
Tsotsobe keeps it straight, Jamshed stays back and defends
this was fuller in length outside off and driven but he can't beat cover
hits a good length outside off and angling in, defended to the off side
pitched it up outside off and he pushes it away gently to cover
Morris is not giving them any room whatsoever, Hafeez xan only go back and defend
this was fuller in length but still no room to free his arms, good bowling, pushes it off the middle of the bat to mid-off
140 kph, hits a good length outside off and he punches it beyond point
good length outside off and he pushes it to short cover
fuller delivery and he pushes it to the on side
this was wide outside off and deserved to be hit and Duminy misfields at cover, allows a single
Hafeez goes for the slash! This was a touch wide but the extra bounce made the difference
angles it across the right-hander and he leaves it alone
fans had gone silent for a while...until now, Morris makes the mistake of bowling a half volley on the pads, Jamshed works his wrists well, clips it wide of midwicket
bowls it straighter and on the off stump and he defends to the off side
angles across the left-hander and he stays beside the line and knocks it to the off side
stays back at the crease and knocks it towards square leg

Morris strikes again and it's a soft dismissal! Morris this time bangs it in short and it's just the right length to get Hafeez pulling, he couldn't resist going for the pull and he miscued it to square leg who back-pedals and takes the catch
angles it inwards and he doesn't offer a shot
good length on the off stump and he defends to the bowler
doesn't give him room again, he stays back and defends, will Jamshed try something different?
not this time, it was wider outside off and Jamshed wasn't interested in chasing that
tucks him up for room again and he goes right back and defends
may have been an opportunity there, this was full and moving away and he could only push it to mid-off
Jamshed tried to run this wide of point and down to third man but couldn't get it past the infield, good over there a maiden
McLaren starts off with a length delivery outside off, Malik leaves it alone
he has a bit of width to work with, Malik can only chop it to the off side
this was pitched up fuller, Malik prodded forward and nearly edged it to the keeper
this one hurried on him, defended and the ball drops on the pitch
angles it inwards and he goes back at the crease and defends
keeps it nice and tight, he stays back and defends, two consecutive maidens, you have to give credit to the SA bowlers
quicker one to start with, Jamshed drills it down the track
drifting on the pads and he works it to deep square leg
full on the stumps and driven firmly back to the bowler
this was dropped shorter and but didn't give him the width he expected, chopped it to sweeper cover
rare loose delivery, fired down the leg side, Jamshed tries to sweep, beats everyone
picks it from outside off and drills it to long-on
drops it short outside off and he cuts it to sweeper cover
McLaren teases him with width, pitches it up and Malik chases it and nearly edges it
Malik is more watchful this time, doesn't offer a shot as the ball leaves it
close call for Malik as he gets an inside edge to the thigh and the ball dribbles close to the stumps
angles it inwards and he knocks it to the on side
good length outside off and he gets across and taps it to the off side
stays back at the crease and Malik pushes it to the off side, plays out yet another McLaren maiden
flatter and quicker and he pushes it back to the bowler
stays back at the crease and he knocks it to mid-on
works it wide of midwicket
had to scamper, this was played down to mid-on, Malik had to hurry and he dived
slides down the leg side and wide called
quicker delivery and he pushes it to mid-on
short outside off and he pushes it down to cover
fullish in length on the pads and he works it to square leg
something had to give, this was dragged short, Jamshed read the length early and pulled it behind square on the on side, boundary to long leg
stays behind the line and he defends to the off side
135 kph, this one skids through and beats the left-hander, nips away off the pitch
tucks him up for room and he can only stay back and work it to mid-on
tossed up and he comes forward and pushes it to the off side
comes down the track and checks his drive
quicker delivery and he comes forward and defends
Jamshed comes in the way of a booming drive! Malik went down the track and drove on the up, Jamshed didn't have time to get out of the way and he's hit flush on the body, that would have stung
tossed up outside off and he comes forward and pushes it to point
quicker delivery and he clips it to the on side
Malik shuffles a long way across his stumps and creates an opportunity to score off McLaren, clips it to fine leg
full in length and he drills it down the track
this was a length ball on the stumps, defended down the track
drifts on the pads and he shuffles and works it to fine leg
a bit too straight and Malik stays at the crease and works it with the angle down to midwicket
good length on middle and leg and he knocks it towards midwicket
tossed up outside off and driven down to mid-off
comes down the pitch but it wasn't the length to be lofting, he had to check his shot, lobs off the pads
works it down to square leg
stays back at the crease and knocks it to long-on
that was what the crowd was waiting for, tossed up on the off stump, Jamshed made just enough room and lofted crisply down the ground wide of mid-off
flatter delivery and he works it to mid-on, and it's drinks
gets away with a loosener, short one and he can only chop it to cover
stays back and knocks it down to long-on

Rolls onto the stumps! Duminy tossed that up outside off, landed it on the rough, Malik was a long way forward to block the turn, didn't defend it properly and the ball rolled back and hit the base of the stumps before he could react
almost got another to sneak through! Misbah on the back foot, gets an inside edge to his boot
reaches out and drives towards cover
gets on the front foot and drives to mid-off
Morris returns for a new spell, gets the ball to hurry onto Jamshed who tries to work it away but gets hit on the pad
fuller delivery and he gets forward and pushes it to midwicket
just short of a length and he mistimes the punch to backward point
angles it on the pads and he mistimes it to fine leg
angles towards the body and he works it to the on side
comes forward and chips it in the air down to square leg, big cheers for pakistan's 50
flatter delivery and he pushes it to mid-on
there was no way Misbah was missing out on that one, half tracker wide outside off and punched to sweeper cover
on the pads and he clips it to short fine leg
stays back and punches it wide of cover
tossed up wide outside off and he gets across and pads it away
full on the pads and drilled to long-on
full outside off and he pushes it back to the bowler
shuffles at the crease and knocks it to the on side
quicker one and he softly pushes it to the onside
this was chipped in the air towards midwicket, the keeper got a bit excited
another close call as Jamshed chips a low full toss in the air wide of the bowler and down to long-on
does full justice to a poor ball, dropped far too short, Jamshed rocks back and clubs it wide of midwicket, Amla dives in vain at the deep
full and driven back to the bowler
tossed up outside off and he pushes it towards cover
shorter and he drills it down to long-on
good improvisation from Misbah, goes a long way across the stumps and plays a lap sweep down to fine leg
tossed up on the pads and he gets across and works it to square leg
gives it more air and he lunges forward to defend
gets forward to drive but gets an inside edge to the on side
tossed up outside off and he pushes it to long-off
clips it down to deep midwicket for a single
flatter delivery, clipped towards midwicket
bowled flatter and Misbah plays the reverse sweep but finds short third man
slower delivery and he clips it to the leg side
fuller delivery and he drives this one down to long-off
tossed up outside off and driven to cover
tossed up and pushed to the off side for a single
I think the whole of Birmingham heard that, loud cheers as Misbah went down on his knee and slogged this one down to deep midwicket
flicks this one between midwicket and square leg
tossed up on the pads and swept firmly down to deep square leg
flatter delivery and he defends with soft hands
Misbah shuffles about at the crease to unsettle the bowler, clips it to deep midwicket they think of the second run
flatter delivery and nudged to midwicket
uses his wrists and flicks it away
short of a length outside off and he chops it towards point
Misbah plays it rather late and dabs it down to third man with the angle
good length outside off and he pushes it wide of cover point
This was banged in short and he stayed back to pull in front of square
full outside off and angling away, Misbah drives him wide of cover
Jamshed knocks it back to the bowler, Pakistan still patient
Misbah shapes to reverse sweep and AB sensed that quickly  and moved to his right, Misbah hit it straight on AB's boot, Misbah was a bit stunned
oh well Misbah what are you doing? Went right back at the crease and was nearly caught in front of the stumps, the bounce saved him, Phangiso appealed
defends this to the leg side
tossed up and defended to the on side
pushes it down to extra cover
tucks it away behind square
it's a low full toss which he drills wide of midwicket

sharp return catch! Tsotsobe bowls the off cutter a touch wide outside off, Jamshed shapes to drive through the off side but turns the face of the bat at the point of contact, it goes low back to Tsotsobe who does well to pluck it on his follow through
gives him width outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
this was a touch wide outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
just short of a length and he shoulders arms
fullish delivery on the pads and he works it towards mid-on
Misbah makes room and pushes a full delivery to cover
outside edge and no slip, this one didn't turn and he ended up pushing at it, the fielder chases at third man
flatter delivery on the stumps and he drives to cover
he risks staying back to one that really skidded, had he missed then timber (!)
works it to the off side
floated on the off stump and he drives him down to cover
goes back and takes a single to square leg
punches it down to cover
quicker delivery, he gets forward and drives to cover
gives it more air and he drives with more conviction this time, to sweeper cover
another attempt at a reverse sweep by Misbah that doesn't fetch anything, finds short third man, tells his partner to wait as soon as he hit the shot
gets an outside edge to third man
gets forward to drive and gets an outside edge, chance for AB but he doesn't get his glove behind it, deflects off his thigh to the off side
fullish delivery and he stays back and defends
blocks it out in front of the stumps
he drives wide of point
stays back and drills it down to long-on
flatter delivery and he knocks it to the off side
inside edge to the boot! Nearly another dismissal like Malik's
quicker delivery and he works it to the on side
flatter one and he clips it to square leg
shuffles and works it with the angle to square leg
more shots like that will help, this was too short and he rocks back and pulls in front of square, wide long-on slides and cuts it off
flatter delivery and he pushes it to mid-off
another reverse sweep produces nothing, straight to short third man
good bowling by Phangiso, he bowled it flatter seeing Misbah shuffle across, can only defend
full outside off and pushed wide of cover
flighted outside off and he lunges forward and blocks it out
stays back and he punches it down to deep extra cover
shuffles across and clips it wide of square leg and does well to run the first one hard
quicker and flatter and drilled down to long-on
Stays back and punches it back to the bowler
drops it short and he can only chop it to point
hits a good length on the off stump and he stays back and defends
full and moving in, he comes across and defends
fullish in length outside the off stump and he softly pushes it towards mid-off
manages to find a big gap at third man, opens the face and dabs it there
good length on the pads and he tucks it away to square leg
short of a length and he punches it to point, it's drinks
Morris returns for a new spell, short of a length outside off and he chops it to the off side
rare loose delivery, down the leg side and Amin gets on one leg and the ball clips his pads and races to fine leg, Vital Signs' Dil dil Pakistan playing on the loudspeaker to pump up this pair
pushes it towards cover
close call! He shapes to pull and gets an inside edge to the pads, the ball rolls to the off side and they take the single, a direct hit and Amin would have been out by miles
stays back and blocks it away
the volume's cranked up again, this was pitched up and Misbah lofted him through the line and comfortably cleared mid-on
short of a length and he goes back and punches it wide of point
McLaren sees Misbah making room and deliberately cramps him up, no room to play, he gets an inside edge to the body
keeps it straight and he pushes it back to the bowler
shuffles a long way across thew stumps early to unsettle the bowler, he chips it in the air but wide of midwicket
Misbah continues shuffling, this one's chipped towards mid-on
excellent bowling by McLaren, he fires in a quic yorker and Amin can only squeeze it back to the bowler
Misbah shuffled a long way across and Morris bowled it down the leg side, clipped the thigh pad, should have put that away
short of a length and he gets across and places it behind square
Amin finds the gap! It was full on middle and leg and he made room and bashed it wide of mid-on who dives in vain
full outside off and he drives it hard straight to mid-off
short of a length and he pulled it down to deep square leg
gets on the back foot and punches it down to cover
Misbah moves right across his stumps and clips a full delivery to Amla at deep square leg

Amin goes for the big hit and perishes, he made himself room to a length delivery and looked to launch it over the on side,  swings and gets a top edge that swirls towards mid-off and cover, Ingram takes the skier
they're cheering again, cleverly played by Misbah, this was a half volley on the pads and instead of trying to go over the top he chooses to flick it away behind square leg along the turf
gets on the back foot and pushes it towards point
stays beside the line and works it to cover point

South Africa are chipping away at the wickets and this was a sharp catch by Faf! This was a length ball outside off and Akmal gets on the front foot for a square drive, drives on the up  and du Plessis at backward point reacts quickly, falls to his left and takes it inches off the ground, that was traveling quickly
Misbah's not done yet, tossed up on middle and off, makes room and bashes a flat six over long-on, brings up his fifty too
almost a run-out! Misbah makes room and drives hard towards extra cover, du Plessis does well to dive and cut it off and Misbah set off and had to hurry back, AB fails to hit the stumps
tossed up and he blocks it out
comes well forward and defends
confusion again! Tucked towards square leg, hesitation and they go through with it
tossed up and he gets forward and drives to the off side
flatter delivery and he sweeps him to wide of midwicket
turns it away behind square leg
tucks him up for room and he chops it to the off side
another one skids through and he goes back and knocks it down to sweeper cover
full outside off and he gets a thick outside edge that drops short of short third man
full on the pads and he drills it down to long-on
is this the final nail in the coffin? Misbah goes. It was the slower ball from Tsotsobe, Misbah gets on his knee and goes for the slog, mistimes it and ends up hitting it flat to midwicket
full outside off and he tries to run it to third man and misses
full and wide outside off and he swings and misses
just as a few supporters leave the ground in disappointment Ajmal blazes one through cover, it was full and wide and bashed between two fielders
misfielded! This was pushed towards the pads, he sweeps and Tsotsobe misfields at short fine leg, he gathers himself and tries to pull it back but in vain
another one! Tossed up on the pads, Riaz slogs and it's in the air and down to deep square leg
slashes and gets an outside edge past the keeper, third man mops up
the reverse sweep hasn't really been a success tonight has it? Riaz is brave enough to attempt it, Phangiso fires it on the leg stump, not the most ideal shot for that ball, hits the woodwork
gets back to cut and he cuts to short third man
pushes it down to long-off
short of a length and angling across him, he pushes it wide of point
short outside off and he pushes it down to mid-off
makes a lot of room and miscues the pull
backs away and miscues him down  to midwicket
backs away for the slog and he swishes at thin air
short of a length outside off and he pushes it to cover
South Africa getting done with the formalities, this was banged in short, Ajmal was only aiming for the straight boundary nevertheless, miscued to mid-on
the slower bouncer and he makes room to pull but misses it
drills a full ball down to mid-on, the fielder his the stumps at the bowler's end and Irfan ground his bat, they could have taken an overthrow off the deflection but Irfan had no clue
full length delivery squeezed to the on side

the stumps are a mess and South Africa have finished this with 5 overs to spare! Junaid makes room to smash it, McLaren fires it full on the base of the stumps and sends it scurrying a few yards back, he picks up four for 19
